title: Miles Newlyn
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224944/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224944/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Miles Newlyn**

Born: Leicester, United Kingdom, 1969.

Miles Newlyn graduated from St Martins College of Art, London, in 1991. He first released Missionary, Sabbath Black, and Democratica through [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224944/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre), and then designed a set of six keynote typefaces for [David Carson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224944/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Carson).

[www.newlyn.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224944/http:/www.newlyn.com/ "www.newlyn.com")
author: miles
